resources.string: Contrary to popular belief, Lorem Ipsum is not simply random text.The first line of Lorem Ipsum, "Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet..",
Location: This permission is required so we can send the your location to your contact when you send their messsage...
Contacts: We need need permission to read your contacts so you can choose which contacts to contact in case of an emergency.....
Text Messages(sms): We need this permission to be able to send a text message to your contacts in case of an emergency....
Call: We also need permission so you can make a phone call in case of an emergency.....
These are the permissions that our app requires...We need them.....for this and that...
Click the forward arrow to grant access to permissions and select your contacts to send message...more.. and more...

Location: This permission is required so we can send the your location to your contact when you send their messsage... Call: We also need permission so you can make a phone call in case of an emergency.....
These app requires permission to access information from your phone.We need location, contact, sms and call.

Text Messages(sms): We need this permission to be able to send a text message to your contacts in case of an emergency.... Contacts: We need need permission to read your contacts so you can choose which contacts to contact in case of an emergency.....
